title: A third straight week of tech layoffs in the books - TechCrunch
content:
1. A third straight week of tech layoffs in the books  TechCrunch
  2. Economic uncertainty starts to hit tech job market with reports of hiring slowdowns, rescinded offers  GeekWire
  3. Some tech firms hit the pause button on hiring  Computerworld
  4. Startup Layoffs Start as Tech Stocks Get a Crushing Reality Check  Bloomberg
  5. Tech Layoffs And Hiring Freezes Appear To Accelerate  Crunchbase News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: You thought the market was bad for VCs, but what about the workers behind the tech companies they’ve backed? Reluctantly, we’re writing another tech layoffs roundup.
